TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 58, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_wall", "quantity": 7, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 30, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 4, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "pink_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft leather, I need to place 4 rabbit hides in the crafting grid. Therefore I will start by moving one rabbit hide from slot 32 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 58, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_wall", "quantity": 7, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 30, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 3, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "pink_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 43}]
thought: I have placed 1 rabbit hide in the crafting grid, and therefore I need to place another one next to it. I will do so by moving the rabbit hide from slot 32 into slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: I have placed 2 rabbit hides in the crafting grid, and therefore I need to place another one below them. I will do so by moving the rabbit hide from slot 32 into slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 58, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_wall", "quantity": 7, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 30, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "pink_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 43}]
thought: I have placed 3 rabbit hides in the crafting grid, and therefore I need to place another one to the right of them. I will do so by moving the rabbit hide from slot 32 into slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: leather
inventory=[{"type": "leather", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "yellow_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 58, "index": 14}, {"type": "prismarine_wall", "quantity": 7, "index": 19}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 30, "index": 25}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 55, "index": 37}, {"type": "pink_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 52, "index": 43}]
thought: I have crafted the leather, and therefore I need to move it out of the crafting grid and into my inventory. I will do so by moving the leather from slot 0 into slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
